synopsis.text: Yume Nijino enrolls in the prestigious Four Stars Academy, determined to become a top idol like the members of the school's elite S4 group. She and the other newcomers must discover and develop their talents across various disciplines like singing, dancing, and acting. Yume delivers a stellar debut performance, impressing even the aloof S4, but later collapses from exhaustion, unable to recall being on stage. As Yume struggles to find consistency, she forms a friendly rivalry with the bold Laura Sakuraba. Through hard work and determination, alongside the support of new friends, Yume pursues her ultimate goal of joining the ranks of the academy's top idols. But the road ahead remains arduous, demanding great sacrifice. Can Yume's passion and skill truly earn her a place among the S4?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
